title: Flexible Email Parser
description: Finds email addresses in a blob of inputted text and formats the results for use in sending an email.

cards.title: Text Input Screen.
cards.description: The initial state of the page. Purpose and instructions are clearly presented with the placeholder of the text area input.

cards.title: Results
cards.description: If any email addresses are found in the blob of text, they appear in a formatted list in a new text area below the original. Upon clicking the new text area, its text becomes selected, making it easier to then copy the text for use in an email client.
